column5: Well I decided it was time to upgrade my vehicle. I was going to buy a newer XL Denali but decided to save some money for now.  So I sold this    and bought this    then decided to get this    I am hoping that we get one more little snow storm this year to rip around on it but at least I will put in a lot more ice fishing next year!  On the other hand I wanna get my boat out because I'm going crazy. I haven't been fishing since the fall
nice but sorry no more snow this year please lol  cheers!
Real nice upgrade Dan    Congratulations But please no more snow.... it just perfect on the ice surface for walking right now
A baby Tahoe  Nice clean truck  Wonder if you will miss the extra room...will be easier to park thats for sure
I love the stealthed out mach1.

so you saved a ton, go get the Denali emblems from the dealer, just a glorified Yukon Denali/Escalade anyhow,nice rides I was gonna get one last summer ,but convinced myself I needed another pick up ,now that ole Mach ohh boy ,I hope ya got a strong back
my tahoe has 302'000 miles great buy congrats
